author: Buddha
message: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
title: Thought of the day

author: Barack Obama
message: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones weve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
title: Thought of the day

author: George Santayan
message: Those who cannot learn from history are doomed to repeat it.
title: Thought of the day
